means: [法律] 把（财产，权利、利息）从一人转让给另一人
[常用复数][法律]受让人，接受财产等转让的人，受托者

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"任命，委派"之意。
means: appoint ：通常指不经过选择的官方委任。
designate ：书面用语，侧重当权者或机构的选拔或任命，有时含强行指定的意味。
assign ：常指给一群人或个人分配、分派、指派或委派任务。
name ：普通用词，着重任命的结果，而不是过程。
nominate ：通常指为某一公职选择候选人，并将其提交给有决定权的人作最后决定。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"分配，分发"之意。
means: assign ：指按照某种原则进行的硬性分配，也不一定是很公平的。
distribute ：通常指以整体或定量分为若干份来分配。
divide ：普通用词，侧重将某物分成若干份分配给他人，当某物一分为二时，含平均分配之意。
allocate ：主要指金钱、财产、权力或领土等的分配，着重分配的比例和专门用途。

sentence.Network_en: It had been a monumental blunder to give him the assign-ment.
sentence.Network_cn: 当时把这项任务给他是大错特错了。

sentence.Network_en: When teachers assign homework, students usually feel an obligation to do it.
sentence.Network_cn: 当老师布置家庭作业的时候，学生们通常觉得做作业是分内之事。

sentence.Network_en: It is possible to assign an exact date to this building.
sentence.Network_cn: 这座建筑物的确切年代是可以确定的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Old French asigner, assiner, from Latin assignare, from ad- 'to' + signare 'to sign'

encyclopedia.content: C++ string类的成员函数，用于拷贝、赋值操作，它们允许我们顺次地把一个string 对象的 部分内容拷贝到另一个string 对象上。 函数原型： string &operator=(const string &s);把字符串s赋给当前字符串 string &assign(const char *s);用c类型字符串s赋值 string &assign(const char *s,int n);用c字符串s开始的n个字符赋值 string &assign(const string &s);把字符串s赋给当前字符串 string &assign

entry.def: If you assign a piece of work to someone, you give them the work to do.

example.ex: When I taught, I would assign a topic to children which they would write about...
example.tran: 我教课时会给孩子们布置一个题目，让他们就这个题目写点东西。

example.ex: Later in the year, she'll assign them research papers...
example.tran: 今年晚些时候，她将给他们指定研究论文。

entry.def: If you assign something to someone, you say that it is for their use.

example.ex: The selling broker is then required to assign a portion of the commission to the buyer broker...
example.tran: 卖方经纪人须随后将部分佣金分给买方经纪人。

example.ex: He assigned her all his land in Ireland.
example.tran: 他把自己在爱尔兰的所有土地都转给了她。

entry.def: If someone is assigned to a particular place, group, or person, they are sent there, usually in order to work at that place or for that person.

example.ex: I was assigned to Troop A of the 10th Cavalry...
example.tran: 我被派往第10骑兵队的A连。

example.ex: Did you choose Russia or were you simply assigned there?...
example.tran: 你是自己选择去的俄罗斯还是就是被派到那里的？

entry.def: If you assign a particular function or value to someone or something, you say they have it.

example.ex: Under Mr. Harel's system, each business must assign a value to each job...
example.tran: 根据哈雷尔先生的体系，每个企业必须赋予每份工作一定的价值。

example.ex: Assign the letters of the alphabet their numerical values — A equals 1, B equals 2, etc.
example.tran: 给字母表里的每个字母赋予相应的数值——A等于1，B等于2，等等。

means.word_mean: 1. give an assignment to (a person) to a post, or assign a task to (a person)
4. select something or someone for a specific purpose;

sentences.sentence: "The teacher assigned him to lead his classmates in the exercise"
"She put too much emphasis on her the last statement"
"He put all his efforts into this job"
"The teacher put an interesting twist to the interpretation of the story"

means.word_mean: 8. decide as to where something belongs in a scheme;

sentences.sentence: "The biologist assigned the mushroom to the proper class"

auth_sentence.content: To say nothingness existed is to assign it substance.

auth_sentence.res_content: Can we assign the March records to climate change?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Can we assign the March records to climate change?

auth_sentence.content: I assign that timidity to two other causes.
auth_sentence.res_content: I assign that timidity to two other causes.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =mark,表示"记号,信号,标志"; 2. 签署

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有意义的;重大的,重要的
stems_affixes.word_buile: significance[[n.意义,含义;重要性,重要的]]→adj.有意义的;重大的,重要的
in内部+sign记号,信号,标志+ia状态→内部标志

stems_affixes.value_cn: 分配,指派;[指定的]作业,[分派的]任务
stems_affixes.word_buile: assign派给,分配+ment表名词→n.分配,指派;[指定的]作业,[分派的]任务
consign[v.托运,托人看管]+ment表名词→n.托运,寄售
de加强+sign记号→做好记号→设计
designate[v.指明,指出;任命,指派]+ion表名词→designation指定

stems_affixes.value_cn: 旗, 军舰旗, 军旗, 徽章,舰旗[船上表示所属国家的旗帜]
stems_affixes.word_buile: en内部+sign记号,信号,标志→内部标志
resign[v.辞去,辞职,使听从[于],使顺从]+ation表名词→n.放弃,辞职,反抗
sign记号,信号,标志→n.符号；手势；征兆，迹象 v. 签名；作手势
sign记号,信号,标志+al→n.信号,暗号 v.发信号,用信号通知
sign记号,信号,标志+ature表名词→记号的东西→签名
sign记号,信号,标志+et做记号→图章

stems_affixes.value_cn: 意义,含义;重要性,重要的
stems_affixes.word_buile: signifi=signify[v.表示,意味;要紧,有重要性]+cance→n.意义,含义;重要性,重要的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 派给,分配;选定,指定[时间,地点等]
stems_affixes.word_buile: as加强+sign签署→指定
de加强+sign记号→做好记号→设计
de加强+sign记号+ate表动词→指定记号→指定,指明
con共同+sign记号,信号,标志→共同做记号→把……委托给别人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 辞去,辞职,使听从[于],使顺从
stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+sign签署→v.辞去,辞职,使听从[于],使顺从
sign记号,信号,标志→n.符号；手势；征兆，迹象 v. 签名；作手势
sign记号,信号,标志+al→n.信号,暗号 v.发信号,用信号通知

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使著名, 使显著, 使显眼, 向……发信号
stems_affixes.word_buile: signal信号+ize表动词→发信号
sign记号,信号,标志+et做记号→图章

stems_affixes.value_cn: 表示,意味;要紧,有重要性
stems_affixes.word_buile: sign记号,信号,标志+ify……化→用信号表示→象征

Sentence.sentence: She had been brought up on a farm, so the Peace Corps assigned her to an agricultural project.
What was Donna assigned to do in Brazil
Each of the 300 arriving ninth graders are randomly(随机地) assigned to one of the houses.
I've been assigned to cover the governess speech today.
That same study found that randomly assigned interracial roommates at Ohio State broke up before the end of the quarter about twice as often as same-race roommates.
Fazio's Indiana study found that three times as many randomly assigned interracial roommates were no longer living together at the end of the semester, compared with white roommates

sentences.en: They have assigned me a small room.
sentences.cn: 他们已给我分配了一个小房间。

sentences.en: The captain assigned two soldiers to guard the gate.
sentences.cn: 上尉派了两个士兵守大门。

sentences.en: He assigned the students a few books to read.
sentences.cn: 他给学生指定了几本书要他们读。

means.word_mean: 把…归属(于)，把…归于，把…归因于，把…归咎于(to，for)

sentences.en: Jealousy was assigned as motive for the crime.
sentences.cn: 把这一犯罪行为的动机归因于忌妒。

jushi.english: These carbines were assigned for guard duty.
jushi.chinese: 这些卡宾枪是站岗时用的。

jushi.english: Detectives have been unable to assign a motive for the murder.
jushi.chinese: 侦探们还未能找出谋杀的动机。

jushi.english: They assigned the rooms at the hotel.
jushi.chinese: 他们对旅馆房间做了分配。
